text: is a Japanese footballer. He is a defender. He was educated at and played for Osaka Kyoiku University before moving to Singapore.http://www.albirex.com.sg/en/archives/17118/ He signed for Albirex Niigata FC (Singapore) from the S.League in 2016 having previously played for Hiroshima Minami High School & Osaka Kyoiku University.http://www.albirex.com.sg/en/archives/17118/ He extended his contract for 2017.http://www.albirex.com.sg/en/archives/21624/ ==Club career statistics== As of Jan 2, 2017 {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" |- ! colspan=3 | Club performance ! colspan=2 | League ! colspan=2 | Cup ! colspan=2 | League Cup ! colspan=2 | Total |- !
